targets.query:
from(bucket: "tasks")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ttn_uplink")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "confidence")
  |> count()

from(bucket: "tasks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ttn_uplink")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "tasks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ttn_uplink")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "tasks")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ttn_uplink")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "confidence")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: now() - r._time) / 1000000.0 }))

from(bucket: "tasks")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ttn_uplink")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "confidence")
  |> mean()

from(bucket: "tasks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ttn_uplink")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "event_type")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with event_type: string(v: r._value), _value: 1.0 }))
  |> group(columns: ["event_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "tasks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ttn_uplink")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "confidence")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "tasks")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ttn_uplink")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["device_id", "event_type", "confidence", "lux", "_time"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 20)
